Reference

All functions

addpops()

addpops adds the populations from a single replicate together

addrecvar()

addrecvar adds recruitment variation to end of conditioning step

adjustavrec()

adjustavrec re-fits the AvRec saudatafile values in the MSE

aMSE

aMSE functions for Conditioning and Running an Invertebrate MSE

asSAU()

asSAU generates an output list of SAU values from the in put zoneDP

aszone()

aszone sums the various SAU dynamics and fishery properties

biology_plots()

biology_plots generates a series of stored plots and tables

boxbysau()

boxbysau generates boxplots of sau x aavc or sum5 or sum10

calccatchHSPM()

calccatchHSPM calculates all the HSPMs for the actual catch data

calcprojsel()

calcprojsel generates the selectivity and selectivity x weight

calcsau()

calcsau compares an input variable to a constant for each SAU

catchbpstats()

catchbpstats saves the boxplot statistics and adds to MSE webpage

catchHSPM()

catchHSPM generates boxplots of catch HSPMs and output statistics

catchvsMSY()

catchvsMSY by sau divides the projected catches by the sau MSY value

catchweightCE()

catchweightCE uses historical catch-by-sau to make weighted zone cpue

changecolumn()

changecolumn alters a selected column of recdevs in the control file

changeline()

changeline replaces a given line in a given file with new text

changevar()

changevar can alter the value in a single line in, eg, the control file

checkmsedata()

checkmsedata contains some tests of the input MSE saudata file

checksizecompdata()

checksizecompdata is a utility to allow a check of their sizecomp data

compareCPUE()

compareCPUE plots the historical cpue against conditioned cpue

comparedynamics()

comparedynamics plots medians and quantiles of dynamic variables

comparefinalscores()

comparefinalscores compares the median final HS scores from scenarios

comparevar()

comparevar generates the quantiles for each of a set of input scenarios

compzoneN()

compzoneN compares numbers-at-size before/after depletion

confirmdir()

confirmdir checks to see if a directory exists and makes it if not

constructTasHSout()

constructTasHSout remakes outputs from the hcrfun for all projections

copyto()

copyto copies a vector of files from one scenario directory to another

cpueboxbysau()

cpueboxbysau generates boxplots of sau x years to max median cpue

cpueHSPM()

cpueHSPM generates boxplots of cpue HSPMs and output statistics

ctrlfiletemplate()

ctrlfiletemplate generates a template input control file

datafiletemplate()

datafiletemplate generates a template input datafile akin to M15h75

defineBlock()

defineBlock subdivides defined number of populations into blocks

definepops()

definepops makes a parameter vector, popdef, for each population

depleteSAU()

depleteSAU resets zoneD, approximately to an input depletion level

diagnosticsproj()

diagnosticsproj plots a series of diagnostics to DiagProj

dohistoricC()

dohistoricC imposes the historical catches on an unfished zone

doproduction()

doproduction estimates a production curve for each population

doprojections()

doprojections conducts the replicate model runs for Tasmania

doquantplot()

doquantplot generates a plot of multiple quantile values

doquantribbon()

doquantribbon generates a ribbon of multiple quantile values

dosau()

dosau plots the conditioning history for the dynamics

dosauplot()

dosauplot generates the plot of the chosen variable for each sau

do_comparison()

do_comparison is a wrapper function that compares scenarios

do_comp_outputs()

do_comp_outputs extracts components of the output from do_comparison

do_condition()

do_condition is a function to assist with conditioning the model

do_MSE()

do_MSE an encapsulating function to hold the details of a single run

driftrec()

driftrec adjusts the recruitment allowing for larval drift

fillzoneDef()

fillzoneDef characterizes simulated Zone; holds zone properties

finalcondyeardepletion()

finalcondyeardepletion plots and tabulates final depletion after conditioning

findF1()

findF1 approximates the F0.1 harvest rate for each population

findlinenumber()

findlinenumber prints out the contents of a text file with line numbers

findmsy()

findmsy identifies the closest productivity value to MSY

fishery_plots()

fishery_plots generates a set of plots relating to the fishery properties

getaav()

getaav calculates annual absolute variation in catch

getavrec()

getavrec pulls out just the AvRec values for each sau for a scenario

getConst()

getConst extracts 'nb' numbers from a line of text

getCPUEssq()

getCPUEssq calculates ssq between historical and conditioned cpue

getdynamics()

getdynamics extracts the sau dynamics for a sau

getLFdata()

getLFdata reads the observed LF-composition data

getLFlogL()

getLFlogL calculates the multi-nomial log-likelihood for sizecomp data

getline()

getline extracts a vector of numbers from a txt or csv files

getlistvar()

getlistvar extracts a vector or matrix from zoneC

getLogical()

getLogical extracts nb logicals from an input line of text

getmedbysau()

getmedbysau extracts the median projected values for input variables

getnas()

getnas gets the numbers-at-size for all populations and the zone

getprojyraavc()

gerprojyraavc applies the aavc function to the input catches

getprojyrC()

getprojyrC returns cumulative catch from selected projection years

getprojyrs()

getprojyrs i sused to truncate an array to projected years

getrecdevcolumn()

getrecdevcolumn extracts a column of recdevs from a control file

getsauzone()

getsauzone summarizes zoneD into SAU and zone

getsingleNum()

getsingleNum find a line of text and extracts a single number

getssqparts()

getssqparts calculates the ssq for the cpue and size-comp data

getStr()

getStr obtains a string from an input text line

getsum()

getsum sums each of the main dynamics within zoneD

gettasdevssq()

gettasdevssq calculates the SSQ between observed and predicted CPUE

getunFished()

getunFished - extracts all data relating to year 1; unfished.

getvar()

getvar a replacement for sapply to obtain scalar constants

getvect()

getvect extracts invar from the popdef vector in zoneC

getyr2maxce()

getyr2maxce gives a nsau x reps matrix of years to max(cpue)

getzoneLF()

getzoneLF extracts all LF data from a zone across pops and years

getzoneprod()

getzoneprod zone scale summary of product matrix from doproduction

getzoneprops()

getzoneprops extracts the depletion level for a given year

historicalplots()

historicalplots a wrapper function to call plots of fishery plots

HSphaseplot()

HSphaseplot makes a phase plot of predicted mature depletion vs H

imperr()

imperr calculates population catches from sau catches with error

lfs

lfs is a 3-D array of size-composition data for use in examples

logistic()

logistic a Logistic selectivity function

makeabpop()

makeabpop generates full population structure in an unfished state

makecompareoutput()

makecompareoutput generates HTML files when comnparing scenarios

makeequilzone()

makeequilzone high level function generates equilibrium zone

makelistobj()

makelistobj extracts a list of objects from a bigger list of objects

makemove()

makemove produces the movement matrix

makeoutput()

makeoutput take the output from do_MSE and generates the HTML files

makewidedat()

makewidedat converts long data to a wide data format

makezone()

makezone generates the dynamic parts of the simulated zone

makezoneC()

makezoneC makes the constant part of the simulation

makezoneDP()

makezoneDP generates the container for the projection dynamics

maturity()

maturity Logistic maturity curve

midg

midg is an abalone tagging data-set from the Actaeons

modprojC()

modprojC produces three objects used to condition the zone

modzoneC()

modzoneC runs the zone 3 x hyrs to equilibrium

modzoneCSel()

modzoneCSel changes the selectivity characteristics in zoneC

numbersatsize()

numbersatsize plots details of the numbers-at-size

onesau()

onesau plots the dynamics for a single SAU

oneyear()

oneyear one year's harvest dynamics for one abpop

oneyearcat()

oneyearcat one year's catch dynamics for one abpop

oneyearD()

oneyearD conducts one year's dynamics on zoneD in the MSE

oneyearrec()

oneyearrec calculates the Beverton-Holt recruitment

oneyearsauC()

oneyearsauC conducts one year's dynamics using catch not harvest

oneyrgrowth()

oneyrgrowth one years' growth for a population and initial size

onezoneplot()

onezoneplot plots out one variable from the zone

optimizerecdevs()

optimizerecdevs improves the fit to the recdevs for a given sau

plotCNt()

plotCNt plots the historical conditioning Nt or catchN for all years

plotcondCPUE()

plotcondCPUE plots the historical cpue against conditioned cpue

plotconditioning()

plotconditioning illustrate the zones dynamics after conditioning

plothistcatch()

plothistcatch generates a plot of the historical catches by SAU

plothistce()

plothistce generates a plot of the historical cpue by SAU

plothsstats()

plothsstats plots some HS performance statistics

plotNt()

plotNt plots the size-composition for each SAU

plotpopprops()

plotpopprops plots out some properties of input populations

plotprod()

plotprod graphs a selected productivity variable

plotproductivity()

plotproductivity characterizes each population's yield curve

plotrecruitment()

plotrecruitment literally plots stock-recruitment relationships

plotscene()

plotscene literally plots up the output from comparevar

plotsceneproj()

plotscenproj plots a 3D array of data by sau in a single plot

plotsizecomp()

plotsizecomp generates a plot of available size composition data

plotZone()

plotZone plots the projected TAC across all replicates

plotzonedyn()

plotzonedyn plots zonewide catch, mature biomass, harvestR and CPUE

plotzonesau()

plotzonesau generates a plot of the zone scale and sau scale

popNAStosau()

popNAStosau converts NAS data by population to NAS x sau

popsdefine()

popsdefine makes a parameter vector, popdef, for each population

poptosau()

poptosau converts projected population dynamics to SAU scale results

poptosauCE()

poptosauCE combines population cpue into sau as catch weighted sums

poptozone()

poptozone translates the zone_pop objects to a single zone object

prepareDDNt()

prepareDDNt converts the population based historical Nt to SAU-based

prepareprojection()

prepareprojection high level function that sets up a projection

preparesizecomp()

preparesizecomp strips out empty columns and identifies samples

print(<zone>)

print.zone S3 method for printing a summary of a given zone

print(<zoneDefinition>)

print.zoneDefinition S3 method for printing zonedef summary

printline()

printline literally prints a selected line from a text file

projectiononly()

projectiononly converts hyrs+pyrs_sau_reps to pyrs_sau_reps array

putNA()

putNA can add NAs to the start and end of a vector

readctrlfile()

readctrlfile reads the rundir scenario's control file

readpopdatafile()

readpopdatafile reads in a matrix of data defining each population

readsaudatafile()

readsaudatafile generates the constants matrix from sau data

replaceVar()

replaceVar replaces values of a variable in the input datafile

resetexB0()

resetexB0 resets the unfished exploitable biomass at time zero

resetLML()

resetLML sets the LML for a given zone from a given year

restart()

restart transfers final year values of zoneD into the first year

rewritecompdata()

rewritecompdasta recreates the size composition data file

rewritecontrolfile()

rewritecontrolfile generates a revised control file

rewritedatafile()

rewrwitedatafile generates a revised saudatafile

rlnormz()

rlnormz when sd=0 it returns rep(mean,n) but also uses n random numbers

rnormz()

rnormz when sd=0 it returns rep(mean,n) but also uses n random numbers

runthreeH()

runthreeH conducts the dynamics with constant catch 3 times

sauavrecssq()

sauavrecssq applies the AvRec and returns the ssq from the cpue

saudat

saudat is a matrix of constants read by readsaudatafile

sauplots()

sauplots generates the dosauplots for the dynamic variables

sauquantbyscene()

sauquantbyscene calcualtes the quantiles for all sau and all scenarios

saurecdevs()

saurecdevs plots the recruitment deviates for each SAU

sauribbon()

sauribbon a ribbon plot the quantiles x scenes for the input variable

sautopop()

sautopop translates a vector of SAU properties into population properties

saveobject()

saveobject is used to save RData files of particular objects

save_hsargs()

save_hsargs sends a copy of the hs arguments to rundir

scaleto1()

scaleto1 scales an input vector of CPUE to a mean of one x avCE

scenebyvar()

scenebyvar extracts as sau x variable x scenario from do_comparison output

scenebyzone()

scenebyzone extracts as variable x scenario from do_comparison output

setupzone()

setupzone makes zone's constant, dynamic, and productivity parts

STM()

STM Generates the Size Transition Matrix for Inverse Logistic

summarizeprod()

summarizeprod generates a summary of the productivity properties

sumpop2sau()

sumpop2sau gathers population data into sau data using sauindex

sumpops()

sumpops takes the zoneDP and sums the populations within each SAU

tabulatefinalHSscores()

tabulatefinalHSscores saves and write the medina final scores to rundir

tabulateproductivity()

tabulateproductivity produces tables of the MSY and related statistics

tabulatezoneprod()

tabulateproductivity produces tables of the MSY and related statistics

tasab

tasab is a matrix of abalone maturity-at-length data

testequil()

testequil runs a zone for hyrs and determines stability

writecompdata()

writecompdata writes a size-composition file to indir

WtatLen()

WtatLen Power function to describe weight at length relationship

zone

zone a list of 8 major components from makeequilzone function

zone1

zone1 a list of 13 components from makeequilzone's zone for S21

zonetosau()

zonetosau translates the zonexpop objects to zonexsau objects
